dialog.text: Start by dividing the image horizontally into thirds with clouds at the top, trees in the middle, and grass at the bottom.
Yes. What is the weather like?
It’s bright and sunny. The top of the line of trees is jagged with 3 peaks towards the right side. In the left quarter of the image, the trees slope upwards to the top left corner.
About a 45 degree angle, but it’s very wavy so it looks like a curly bracket with the open side facing to the right

Yes. Along the open side of the curly bracket, there are some small ovals of sky. There are two other small patches of sky next to each other within the area of trees at the far left. They are at the same height as the ovals.
Yes. Can you take a peek and let me know how it looks?
Can you scoot the three trees on the right a little bit to the left? The peaks should be more spread apart. Can you also move the top of the grass higher?
Certainly. Is there any more details?

There is a horizontal clump of bush that spreads from nearly the far right up until one fourth of the way from the left side of the image. The clump is within the area of grass but near the top and it is less than a third of the height of the grassy area.
Very nearly, just move the top of the grass up a tiny bit more and then you’re done
